seasight 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Comparison wrapper (current vs best)

sa_compare.Rd

Thin wrapper around compare_to_current() returning its result. If compare_to_current() is not found, an informative error is raised.

Usage

sa_compare(res, current_model)

Arguments

res

Result from auto_seasonal_analysis().

current_model

A fitted seas object to compare against.

Value

List with decision, summary, and aligned SA/seasonal series.
